data.comment: The big names in today's match at Sangju Civic Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
Chae Sanghyeop signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sangju, Sangju Sangmu push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chae Sanghyeop signals a Gangwon throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gangwon at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Chae Sanghyeop signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu drive upfield and [62] gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a [60] defender.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Chae Sanghyeop.
Sangju Sangmu are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Gangwon to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Chae Sanghyeop awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Chae Sanghyeop awards the away team a throw-in.
An attacking Sangju Sangmu player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Kang Sang-uh.
Sangju Sangmu needs to be cautious. Gangwon have an attacking throw-in.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sangju Sangmu's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Gangwon in Sangju.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sangju to check on Jin Seong-uk, who is grimacing with pain.
Goal kick for Gangwon at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Jin Seong-uk has recovered and rejoins the match in Sangju.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
In Sangju Sangju Sangmu attack through Kang Sang-uh. The finish is off target, however.
Gangwon have a goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Chae Sanghyeop signals a throw-in for Sangju Sangmu, close to Gangwon's area.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced Seo Min-woo with Lee Hyeon-sik. This is the first substitution made today by Byung-Soo Kim.
Jung Suk-hwa for Gangwon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Chae Sanghyeop awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Goal kick for Gangwon at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Sangju Sangmu's Jin Seong-uk breaks free at Sangju Civic Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.
Gangwon's Lee Hyeon-sik gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Chae Sanghyeop awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Gangwon.
[62] ([63]) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Chae Sanghyeop will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Sangju Civic Stadium.
The second-half is underway in Sangju.
Sangju Sangmu drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sangju Sangmu's Bae Jae-uh misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Byung-Soo Kim (Gangwon) is making a second substitution, with Kim Ji-hyeon replacing Jung Suk-hwa.
In Sangju, Kim Ji-hyeon of Gangwon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Chae Sanghyeop signals a Gangwon throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
Gangwon apply pressure at Sangju Civic Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Kim Ji-hyeon but the strike hits the bar!
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Gangwon pushes forward through Cho Jae-wan, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Gangwon at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Chae Sanghyeop signals a free kick to Gangwon.
Kim Oh-kyu for Gangwon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Chae Sanghyeop.
At Sangju Civic Stadium, Sangju Sangmu are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sangju Sangmu's [47] is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Throw-in high up the field for Sangju Sangmu in Sangju.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sangju Sangmu's half?
Chae Sanghyeop signals a throw-in for Gangwon, close to Sangju Sangmu's area.
Gangwon's Cho Jae-wan breaks free at Sangju Civic Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Chae Sanghyeop awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Chae Sanghyeop awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ko Mu-yeol is replacing Lee Yeong-jae for Gangwon at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
[47] ([48]) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by [60] defenders.
Sangju Sangmu needs to be cautious. Gangwon have an attacking throw-in.
[47] of [48] smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Gangwon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sangju Sangmu.
At Sangju Civic Stadium, Lee Beom-su has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Sangju Sangmu's [49] gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Seon-min Moon is on a sub for Kang Sang-uh for Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu are coming forward and [49] gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Gangwon at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Chae Sanghyeop.
Goal! Sangju Sangmu extend their lead to 2-0 through Seon-min Moon.
Great play from Han Seok-jong to set up the goal.
Sangju Sangmu drives forward and Seon-min Moon gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Chae Sanghyeop signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
In Sangju, [49] ([50]) misses the target with a header.
Chae Sanghyeop awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Gangwon.
Lee Hyeon-sik (Gangwon) has received a first yellow card.
Sangju Sangmu are pushing forward but Bae Jae-uh's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Chae Sanghyeop.
Kim Ji-hyeon of Gangwon gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu push upfield but Chae Sanghyeop quickly pulls them for offside.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
The home team replace Song Seung-min with Park Se-jin.
Free kick Gangwon.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Gangwon push forward at Sangju Civic Stadium and [62] gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined [60] defence.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
